attributes.action: Free Ashya Kings Parents drop any charges and let them choose the medical care for Ashya
attributes.additional_details:
The treatment of Ashya Kings mother and father has been nothing short of disgusting.

This petition is to clear the family name of any charges and warrants that were served against them to leave them alone and choose as a family what medical care their own son can receive.

They should not be fined in anyway by the NHS and should have their funds released to them for the treatment of their son.
